price: Kaya ang sinumang gumawa ng kasimbigat ng isang katiting na kabutihan ay makikita niya iyon,
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
